question: The incompleteness of the fossil record results primarily from which phenomenon?
candidate_answers: (A) the frequency and irregular timing of organism speciations (B) the metamorphosis of most sedimentary rock by heat and pressure (C) the geologically rapid cycling of crust material back into the mantle (D) the rarity with which organic remains are exposed to fossil-forming conditions
answer: the metamorphosis of most sedimentary rock by heat and pressure
label: B
